pullRequest.title: This moves the AST element builder to use immutable lists
pullRequest.bodyText:
This make the AST elements use immutable lists inside themselves (for performance reasons since they are created on every request but we have convenience methods for the single item add methods from before.
Related to #2099

commit.message: This moves the AST element builder to use immutable lists with the ability to add items to individually

nodes.bodyText: we could change this to ImmutableMap or ImmutableMapWithNullValue too.
